duties_responsibilities.duty: Act as a liaison between the health system and area Emergency Medical Services (EMS) providers.
Serve as an advocate and representative of the hospital with local, regional, and state EMS agencies.
Develop and implement a business plan, driving service line growth, and improving operations.
Responsible for ensuring collaboration across all care settings within the facility as it relates to EMS and disaster preparedness.
Support hospital and departmental Performance Improvement Goals.
Lead, coordinate, attend and participate in routine meetings with EMS and hospital administration.
Provide appropriate patient feedback to EMS agencies.
Coordinate with emergency department leadership, establish and maintain a process to quickly and safely receive patients from EMS agencies.
Develop, manage and facilitate quality assurance activities relating to pre-hospital care.
Gather and report market level intelligence on competitors and consumers (EMS and other public safety agencies).

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's Degree in a related field (Preferred)
